result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: Domestic Abuse - Infliction of Physical Pain or Injury

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Franklin D Easley III

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Franklin D Easley III not in court, in custody.  Attorney Ruby De Leon in court for Franklin D Easley III.  Prosecuting attorney Navjot Singh Hira in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a bail bond hearing. Defense withdraws their motion for a bail bond hearing due to reasons discussed on the record. Case adjourned to Branch 15.

Defendant Franklin D Easley III not in court, in custody.  Attorney Ruby De Leon appeared by video for Franklin D Easley III.  Prosecuting attorney Navjot Singh Hira appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
CASE HEARD OFF THE RECORD DUE TO COURT REPORTER AVAILABILITY.
Case in court for status conference. State is in compliance with victim notification. Court waives defendant's appearance.
Case is in trial posture, defense counsel requests case be placed on the trial calendar.  Any pretrial motions to be filed by the final pretrial date. Defense also requests a Bail/Bond Hearing.
Case adjourned to Branch 15.
Final pre-trial scheduled for January 3, 2023 at 09:00 am.
Jury trial scheduled for January 11, 2023 at 09:00 am.
Bail/bond hearing scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Defense's Notice of Motion and Motion for Bail Reduction or Modification, filed.

Defendant Franklin D Easley III not in court, in custody.  Attorney Ruby De Leon appeared by video for Franklin D Easley III.  Prosecuting attorney Navjot Singh Hira in court for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy court clerk cmt.
Hearing held off the record via Zoom. Defense requests a status conference date. Case adjourned, Branch 15 via Zoom.
Status conference scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Attorney Ruby De Leon in court, defendant Franklin D Easley not in court, in custody.  Navjot Singh Hira appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney appeared by video means.
CASE HEARD OFF THE RECORD DUE TO COURT REPORTER AVAILABILITY.
Case heard by ZOOM.
Case in court for pretrial conference. Defense counsel recently appointed and requests additional time. 
Case adjourned to Branch 15.
This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.  Status conference scheduled for September 13, 2022 at 09:00 am.
State Public Defender - Order Appointing Counsel, received and filed.

Court ordered no contact with J.H
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Franklin D Easley in court with attorney Vincent Paul Guimont.  Defendant Franklin D Easley in custody.  Michael J. Odden appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Ashley, Branch 19. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.
Case is adjourned to Br. 19 for pretrial. 
Effective  July 30, 2022  this calendar will be assigned to Judge JD Watts, Branch 15  in Room 623 of the Courthouse.  
This hearing may be streamed live through DACAST at the Court's discretion: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/21a87aec-ffb6-5325-fb81-55812563aa79  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 18, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
